SEARCH
Package UIs.Buyer.Controllers

Class CatalogController

java.lang.Object
UIs.Buyer.Controllers.CatalogController
public class CatalogController extends Object
The CatalogController class represents a controller responsible for managing the interaction between the buyer user interface and the catalog, allowing the user to browse, search, and interact with products and sellers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CatalogController(Buyer user, DataBase database)
    Constructs a new CatalogController with the specified buyer user and database.

  • Constructor Details

    • CatalogController

      public CatalogController(Buyer user, DataBase database)
      Constructs a new CatalogController with the specified buyer user and database.
      Parameters:
      user - the buyer user associated with the controller
      database - the database containing product and seller information

  • Method Details

    • displayCatalog

      public boolean displayCatalog()
      Displays the catalog and provides options to: get a product, Get a seller's info and products filter products, filter sellers and display products liked by the buyers you follow The user can interact with everone of these options.
      Returns:
      true if the user interaction loop continues, false if the user chooses to return to the menu

    • searchAndDisplayProduct

      public void searchAndDisplayProduct()
      Searches for a product in the catalog and displays its details.

    • searchProduct

      public boolean searchProduct(Catalog catalog)
      Searches for a product in the catalog by the specified title.
      Parameters:
      catalog - the catalog to search within
      Returns:
      boolean true if the user decides to continue searching, boolean false otherwise

    • interactWithProduct

      public void interactWithProduct()
      Displays options for the user to interact with the pointed product. Options include adding the product to the cart, removing and adding it from the wishlist, making an evaluation, interacting with existing evaluations, and returning to the catalog.

    • addProductToCart

      public void addProductToCart(Product product)
      Adds the specified product to the user's cart with a specified quantity. if there are not enough products as required, a message is shown
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add to the cart

    • searchSeller

      public void searchSeller()
      Displays options for searching and interacting with sellers. The user can search for sellers by ID or address and choose to view a seller's profile. Options include following/unfollowing a seller and returning to the main catalog menu.

    • interactWithSeller

      public void interactWithSeller()
      Interacts with the profile of the pointed seller, allowing the user to follow or unfollow the seller and return to the main catalog menu.

    • filterProducts

      public void filterProducts()
      Displays options for filtering products in the catalog based on categories, price, likes, and average rating.

    • filterSellers

      public void filterSellers()
      Displays options for filtering sellers in the catalog based on categories, likes, and average rating.

    • displayProductsLikedByFollowing

      public void displayProductsLikedByFollowing()
      Displays products liked by the buyers followed by the current user.
